body.name: SAMSUNG FT45 Series 24-Inch FHD 1080p Computer Monitor, 75Hz, IPS Panel, HDMI, DisplayPort, USB Hub, Height Adjustable Stand, 3 Yr WRNTY (LF24T454FQNXGO),Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: TCO Certified identifies IT products that are independently assessed for lower environmental and social impact, safer chemicals, and circular design.

features: IMPRESSIVE PICTURE QUALITY: The FT45 Series features an IPS panel for premium picture quality, with vibrant color reproduction and crystal-clear images and text without color shift, and wide viewing angles of 178 ̊

ULTRA THIN BEZELS: Text and graphics are beautifully presented in a 3-sided bezel-less frame, so you see more picture and less plastic; With ultra-slim bezels, multiple monitor configurations are virtually seamless
FAST, EASY CONNECTIVITY: With 2 x HDMI, Display Port and a 2 x USB hub, you have the ability to plug multiple devices directly into the monitor
ERGONOMIC, ADJUSTABLE STAND: The monitor swivels, tilts, pivots and is height-adjustable for comfort over a long workday; VESA compatibility makes installation on a wall or separate mounting arm easy

EASY ON THE EYES: Eye Saver Mode lowers blue light levels, to help reduce eye strain during long work hours; Flicker Free technology adds further viewing comfort by eliminating flickering at all levels of brightness

EYE SAVER MODE & FLICKER FREE: Eye Saver Mode minimizes blue light enough to keep eyes relaxed and comfortable when gaming for extended periods; Flicker Free technology continuously removes tiring and irritating screen flicker so you can focus longer with less distraction or eye strain
body.description: The Samsung FT45 Series is a budget-friendly business monitor with comfortable ergonomics, advanced image quality and modern design. IPS panel technology delivers crisp type and colorful images, even at off-angles. Thin bezels help to make dual monitor configurations more seamless. Connectivity is made simple with DisplayPort and 2 x HDMI ports for flexible inputs. The fully adjustable stand helps to make long days more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, and when my monitor (another brand) died recently I decided to get this one as a replacement. I must say that this monitor impressed me out right out of the gate with the sharpness and image brightness. The colors are vibrant and the text is sharp. I have always been a fan of Samsung TV's, and now I'm a fan of their monitors. Since I use two monitors for work, I plan to order a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for a great price
reviews.reviewText: You expect great quality from Samsung, and judging by the build quality and how it feels, this monitor delivers. Relatively compact size, very clear resolution. Tilts and moves up and down. Your choice of HDMI or Display Port. I really appreciate to be able to get a monitor without bells/whistles. No need for USB ports or speakers, just really good screens for a really good price.I got two of these to extend the desktop of a laptop that plugs into a USB-C dock. It connects without hassle and provides a crystal clear picture. Very happy with this one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent monitor - lousy installation instructions
reviews.reviewText: First and most important, this is an excellent monitor. It is an excellent value for the price. I use it for CAD drawings and it performs beautifully.My only complaint is the installation instructions. They're surprisingly poor. They failed to guide me to a successful installation and Amazon product assistance didn't solve my challenge. I returned the first monitor because I thought it was defective. When I received the replacement, I got the same errors and finally discovered the step I should have taken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Terrible installation instructions, great monitor
reviews.reviewText: The "quick" installation guide that came with our monitor was almost entirely picture, of limited usefulness. It was difficult even to know in what came first, second, etc. Numbers could have told us that! It was exceedinly unclear that you fasten the stand post to the body first, in portrait orientation, then rotate it and attach the base. It wasn't clear until I looked at least three times that the power button also has other functions when tipped to right, left, etc. Important in installation. I could go on. Find on line and use the full user's manual!! Not very good, but better.The monitor itself, thus far, appears to be excellent. Non-glare, good color, sturdy, other features that often cost much more. We got it for a sale price but may buy another at full price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this monitor is a good value. It is not super great but not so bad either, just right one for occasional browsing and editing text documents, and it was relatively inexpensive when I purchased it for my wife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this monitor for my girlfriend because she works from home and had only used a laptop before. She loves the monitor, great size and great quality picture. It also swivels to go up and down, which we probably wont use but its a nice feature. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this display to view my pictures and the clarity is great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice monitor for price
reviews.reviewText: This is just a monitor - no speakers, camera or microphone. It has been installed for 4 weeks; no issues yet.Considering the brand, it appears to be a decent value for the price.
Bon rapport qualité-prix. Belle image, bonne grandeur. Aucun reflet.
Solo puedo decir que llego en perfectas condiciones y luce espectacular
Me gusta el monitor, solo que, me gustaría que cuando presiones el botón para apagar el monitor, este se apague en inmediato, y no presionarlo y luego seleccionar la opción de apagarlo

reviews.reviewTitle: One of those few monitors that have 2 HDMI ports, but...
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those few 22" class monitors that have 2 HDMI ports, plus a DP port, but, like other reviewers have stated, my panel has some dead pixels too. My brand new monitor appears to have 2 or 3 dead (i.e. black) pixels, located roughly an inch from the top. I've read somewhere that the industry considers up to 5 dead pixels to be acceptable. However, this is my first Samsung computer monitor and I have never encountered this issue with other brands such as LG and Dell. That said, the monitor otherwise looks good; the image is bright, nice and crisp. Furthermore, Samsung included a DP cable and a HDMI cable, in addition to the power cable. And I like the adjustable stand. It's just a shame that the panel isn't perfect.
